metadata.feature_description: Select the default landing page for group spaces from dynamically loaded group tabs.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify dropdown populates with available group tabs

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings panel should open with Group Home Page dropdown visible
steps.actual: Community Settings panel opened showing Influence section and Miscellaneous Community Settings with Group Home Page dropdown

steps.action: Scrolled to view Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Group Home Page dropdown should be visible with current selection
steps.actual: Group Home Page dropdown visible showing 'Blogs' as current selection

steps.action: Clicked on Group Home Page dropdown to expand options
steps.expected: Dropdown should expand showing available group tabs
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing 8 group tabs: Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select a group home page from dropdown

steps.action: Selected 'Discussions' from the Group Home Page dropdown
steps.expected: Dropdown should update to show 'Discussions' as selected value
steps.actual: Dropdown updated to show 'Discussions' as selected value

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save group home page selection and verify persistence

steps.action: Clicked Save button to save the 'Discussions' selection
steps.expected: Save operation should succeed with success notification
steps.actual: Save succeeded with 'Item successfully saved.' notification displayed

steps.action: Reloaded the page and navigated back to Community Settings
steps.expected: Group Home Page dropdown should still show 'Discussions' as selected
steps.actual: Group Home Page dropdown shows 'Discussions' as selected - persistence verified

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with multiple group tabs available

steps.action: Expanded dropdown to view all available group tabs
steps.expected: Multiple group tabs should be available for selection
steps.actual: 8 group tabs available: Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki

observations: The dropdown is populated from GroupPages setting returned by the CmxSettingsController API
Default value appears to be 'Blogs' in this test environment, not 0 (no selection) as mentioned in requirements - this may indicate a pre-configured value
During initial testing, the first save appeared to succeed but persistence failed; a second save attempt was required to persist the value correctly - this could indicate a timing or caching issue
The GroupPages dropdown uses the page name as the display text (optionsText: 'key') and page value as the stored value (optionsValue: 'value')
